import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import {connect} from 'unistore/react' import {actions} from '../store'; const Detail = props => { console.log("aaaa", this.state.id) return (

{props.item.item_name}

Rp.{props.item.price}

{props.item.description}

Size : {props.item.size}

Color : {props.item.color}

Store : {props.item.posted_by}

Add to Cart

); } export default connect( "item_detail, id", actions )(withRouter(Detail));
